food.question: I am yellow and you peel me. Monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys love me!
💛 I am the color of the sun.
🌙 I look like a crescent moon before you eat me.

food.question: I am red and round. I grow on a tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White likes me!
🔴 I'm often shiny and good for you.
🌳 I hang from branches.

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Bugs Bunny loves to munch on me!
🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🟠 I am the color of a sunset.

food.question: I am white and cold. I am sweet and you eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 You can add sprinkles to me!
❄️ I melt when it's hot.
🥄 I am best served in a bowl or cone.

food.question: I am a small, green ball. I grow in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow in a shell!
🟢 I am the color of grass.
🥣 You might find me in soup.

food.question: I am brown and crunchy. I go in milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 You eat me for breakfast!
🐅 Tony the Tiger loves me!
🥛 I float around in a bowl of milk.

food.question: I am made of bread, cheese, and sauce. You can put toppings on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I can be cut into slices.
🍅 Tomato sauce is often used on me.
🧀 Cheese is my best friend.

food.question: I am a fruit with a big seed inside. I can be green, red, or yellow on the outside and orange or yellow on the inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow in warm places!
🧡 My flesh is a vibrant color.
⚫ I have a single, large pit in the middle.

food.question: I am a drink made from fruit. I am sweet and refreshing. What am I?

hints.text: 🍹 I am best when served cold!
🍎 I can be made from many different fruits!
🥤 You can pour me from a carton.

food.question: I am made from potatoes, but I am long and thin and crispy. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 People often eat me with ketchup!
🥔 I start out as a vegetable in the ground.
🧂 I taste good with a little salt.

transport.question: I go 'choo choo' and ride on a track. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I carry lots of people.
💨 I sometimes have smoke coming out of me.
🛤️ I follow a special road.

transport.question: I have wheels and you can ride me to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 I am big and yellow!
🚦 I stop at the side of the road for you!
👨‍✈️ A driver controls me

transport.question: I can fly high in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
✈️ I have wings and engines.
💺 People sit inside me.

transport.question: I float on the water and help people travel across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a duck.
⚓ I can have sails or an engine.
🏝️ I can travel to different islands.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🔔 I have a bell.
🧑‍🦽 Some people use me to exercise.
🛣️ I am smaller than a car.

transport.question: I am like a car, but I can carry lots of things. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I am often very big.
🚚 I deliver things to shops.
🛣️ I drive on roads.

transport.question: I fly high and have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
🚨 I am used in emergencies.
🏥 I can take people to hospital very quickly.

transport.question: I have a motor, two wheels, and I am faster than a bicycle. What am I?

hints.text: ⛑️ You wear a helmet when you ride me.
🛵 Some people deliver food on me.
⛽ I need petrol to go.

transport.question: I travel under the city to help people get around quickly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I go in a tunnel.
🚦 You need a ticket to ride me.
📍 I stop at stations.

transport.question: I'm like a boat, but I can go underwater. What am I?

hints.text: 🤿 People can explore the sea in me.
🐟 I can go very deep.
💧 I have a special shape.
